articles.content:
Korean People's Greatest Holidays to Be Commemorated in Kirgyzstan 
   Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- The Kirgyz Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was inaugurated by the Marx-Lenin Reunification Communist Party of Kirgyz People on Jan. 23.
 Chairman of the party A. Uspbayev was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events such as meeting, film show and art performance on the occasions.

articles.content:
Undying Feats of Three Generals of Mt. Paektu Introduced 
   Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Recorded teaching materials dealing with the undying feats performed by the three generals of Mt. Paektu were reportedly posted on Internet homepages operated by the National Alliance for Democracy and Reunification of south Korea and the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions on Jan. 21.
 Some of the 35 recorded teaching materials had titles "Respected Comrade Kim Il Sung was the most outstanding leader who founded the glorious Workers' Party of Korea and strengthened and developed it into a great revolutionary party", "The great leader Comrade Kim Il Sung was the peerless patriot who opened a new history of hewing out the destiny of the nation by achieving the cause of the liberation of the country", "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il is the most illustrious Songun commander who exalted the dignity of our nation to the highest level with his original Songun policy" and "The great Comrade Kim Jong Il is the lodestar of national reunification who opened a new chapter of national cooperation."

articles.content:
Congratulations to Jordanian King
   Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, today sent a congratulatory message to Abdullah II, King of Jordan, on the occasion of his 45th birthday.
 Kim in the message expressed the belief that the bilateral ties of friendship and cooperation would grow stronger in the mutual interests of the two peoples and wished the King and the people of Jordan greater success in their efforts for the development and prosperity of the country and stability and peace in the Mideast region.

articles.title: Strong Actions against Anti-Reunification Forces Called for by Organizations of Chongryon
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Koreans in Japan Protested in S. Korea
   Pyongyang, January 30 (KCNA) -- Members of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration reportedly went on one-by-one demonstration in protest against the Japanese authorities' unreasonable suppression of Koreans in Japan.
 Kwon O Chang, permanent co-representative of the solidarity, staged a demonstration on Jan. 23 and he was followed by Yun Han Thak, permanent co-representative of the solidarity, and So Sang Ho, permanent advisor to the solidarity, on Jan. 25 and 26 respectively.    
 They branded the suppression of Koreans in Japan further intensified by Japan instead of honestly apologizing for the crimes committed against the Korean nation in the past as an unpardonable crime.
